data.title: UN Special Rapporteur warns of rising hate speech fueling real-world violence
data.snippet: The Special Rapporteur on freedom of expression highlights how online hate speech is directly linked to violent attacks against minorities.

data.title: India's IT ministry orders removal of violent speech targeting religious minorities
data.snippet: The ministry issues blocking orders for 150+ social media accounts found to be systematically posting violent threats against minority communities.

data.title: Germany's NetzDG law leads to 10,000 violent speech takedowns in Q1 2026
data.snippet: Germany's network enforcement law continues to drive aggressive content moderation, with platforms removing thousands of posts containing violent rhetoric.

data.title: Study links political violent speech online to increased offline threats against officials
data.snippet: Researchers find a strong correlation between spikes in violent political rhetoric on social media and threats received by elected officials.

data.title: YouTube updates violent speech policy to cover coded threats and dog-whistles
data.snippet: YouTube expands its hate speech policies to address coded language and symbolic threats that previously evaded automated detection.
